department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: fetish dog of diminutive size; finely carved; standing with a large fetish charge secured to the back with resinous compound; a long curling tail behind and the long head upturned; the open jaws with filed teeth above and below; fine dark shiny patina overall
medium: hard wood, fetish composition, resin, traces of tukula and kaolin
title: Fetish Dog
